mean_cn: n. （药）剂量，用量，一剂；  vt. 给……服药
mean_en: the amount of a medicine, drug, or vitamin that is taken at one time
word_etyma: do给 + se名词后缀，物品 → 饮用药量 → dose 一剂药，一剂
sentence: I measure out a single dose of the medicine for the patient.
sentence_trans: 我量出一剂量的药给病人。
sentence_phrase: a single dose of the medicine
